items.sentence: Tom told me that he used to play the clarinet when he was in high school.
Tom was in a hurry to catch the bus, so he didn't stop to talk with Mary.
Tom didn't find out that he'd been adopted until he was thirty years old.
My parents don't like my boyfriend because he dropped out of high school.
I was surprised because my husband actually ate some of our wedding cake.
The driver stopped and opened the door, but nobody got on or off the bus.
All of the passengers managed to escape before the bus burst into flames.
You promised me that you wouldn't spend any more money on computer games.
Nobody knows how or why, but aliens abduct hundreds of people every year.
We searched the entire shop for Tom, and found him in the toy department.
